Name: OpenRCA Telecom
Desc: A telecom service application from the OpenRCA dataset. Contains docker containers (docker_001-008), OS nodes (os_001-021), and database services (db_003, db_007). Uses pre-recorded telemetry data (metrics, traces) with 52 fault injection scenarios covering CPU faults, DB connection issues, and network faults. Note: This dataset does not include application logs.
